member.name: P:iPayables.My.Resources.UserManagement.CHANGED_PWD_MESSAGE_BODY
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to You have recently changed your password in the IATA Simplified Interline Settlement system.

Please contact your administrator if you have any issues accessing the system..

member.name: P:iPayables.My.Resources.UserManagement.RESET_PWD_MESSAGE_BODY
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Your Simplified Interline Settlement account password has changed.

Please go to {0} and use the temporary password {1} to access your account.

Upon login, you will be asked to change your password. Remember! your password must be at least 6 characters in length and contain at least 1 alpha and 1 numeric value. Please contact your administrator with any questions or issues..
